Name: Tall Order
About the game: Tall Order is a fastpaced VR game, well suited for social play in the living room. Features a number of levels, each with their unique theme: Feel the rush of climbing in dizzying heights. Experience the thrill of swinging with grapplehooks, like spiderman. Plus more to come.. Local asymmetric gameplay, with one player in VR and the other at the mouse/keyboard: Play against each other. One in VR and the other on the PC.
Meta Title: Tall Order: Dec 3, 2020, Jonas Molgaard and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Tall Order? Check out the release date (Dec 3, 2020), developer insights from Jonas Molgaard, and a complete game summary.
